history.proof: intros a b c d Hb Hd. unfold Rdiv. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rdiv_plus. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rdiv_plus. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rdiv_minus_distr,Rdiv_plus. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rdiv_minus_distr,Rdiv_plus. rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_r. rewrite (Rmult_comm b d). rewrite (Rmult_comm a d). qsimpl time: 2 use: Rdiv_minus_distr,Rdiv_plus,Rmult_plus_distr_r. rewrite (Rmult_comm c b). qsimpl time: 2 use: Rdiv_minus_distr,Rmult_comm,Rdiv_plus,Rmult_plus_distr_r. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rdiv_minus_distr,Rmult_comm,Rdiv_plus,Rmult_plus_distr_r. unfold Rdiv in *. field. split. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros a b c d Hb Hd.
exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rdiv_plus (_ / _ + _ / _) does not match any subterm of the goal

ctx: intros a b c d Hb Hd.
exceptions.exn: In environment H6 : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, (r1 + r2) * r3 = r1 * r3 + r2 * r3 H3 : forall a b c d : R, (b = 0 -> False) -> (d = 0 -> False) -> a * / b + c * / d = (a * d + c * b) * / (b * d) H1 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 * r2 = r2 * r1 H : forall a b c : R, (a - b) * / c = a * / c - b * / c a, b, c, d : R Hb : b = 0 -> False Hd : d = 0 -> False Unable to unify "False" with "b < 0".

ctx: intros a b c d Hb Hd.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros a b c d Hb Hd.
exceptions.exn: In environment H6 : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, (r1 + r2) * r3 = r1 * r3 + r2 * r3 H3 : forall a b c d : R, (b = 0 -> False) -> (d = 0 -> False) -> a * / b + c * / d = (a * d + c * b) * / (b * d) H1 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 * r2 = r2 * r1 H : forall a b c : R, (a - b) * / c = a * / c - b * / c a, b, c, d : R Hb : b = 0 -> False Hd : d = 0 -> False Unable to unify "False" with "d < 0".

original: intros a b c d Hb Hd. unfold Rdiv. rewrite Rdiv_plus. rewrite Rdiv_plus. rewrite Rdiv_minus_distr. rewrite Rdiv_minus_distr. rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_r. rewrite (Rmult_comm b d). rewrite (Rmult_comm a d). rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_r. rewrite (Rmult_comm c b). rewrite (Rmult_comm c d). rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_r. unfold Rdiv in *. field. split. - apply Rlt_not_eq. apply Hb. - apply Rlt_not_eq. apply Hd.
